column5: I have a VHF radio in my boat, and am going to be heading to Ontario this summer. Anything I should be aware of regarding the use of it in Ontario?Thanks
I have taken a vhf into Canada for 6 years now. My boat has been checked twice, and nothing was said about the radio. I know radar dectectors are a no-no though.
Paul, nothing to worry about. No permits or anything like that needed. They treat it the same as a fishfinder or gps.
